data.comment: This interface provides internal skiller data that should allow for easier debugging of skills and the skiller in general. The most notable feature is a graph representation in the dot language of the available skills (and highlighting for the currently active skill).
data.field: The finite state machine (FSM) the current graph has been updated for.
The selected graph in a dot string representation.
True if the graph is colored, false otherwise.

message.name: SetGraph
message.comment: Set which graph to show. The special string "ACTIVE" (case sensitive) will show the currently active skill's graph (if available).
